briefTitle: A 1-year Trial to Inform About Long-term Exposure to Eptinezumab in Participants With Chronic Cluster Headache (cCH)
officialTitle: Interventional, Open-label, Fixed-dose Multiple Administration Study to Evaluate Long-term Treatment With Eptinezumab in Patients With Chronic Cluster Headache
summary: The main goal of this trial is to inform about long-term safety and tolerability of eptinezumab in participants with chronic cluster headache.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (AEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From the day of first dose of study drug (Baseline [Week 0]) up to Week 56
